description: This file defines a Kotlin class 'VideoDetailsFragment' which represents a UI screen fragment in an Android TV app, showing video details and providing controls to play or resume a video. It manages UI elements, interactions, and communicates with a host interface.

classes.name: VideoDetailsFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that displays video details such as title and description, with buttons to play or resume the video, and handles user inputs including back navigation.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment, retrieves the Video object from arguments.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes UI elements, sets up event listeners and focus logic based on video progress.

methods.name: formatTime
methods.description: Formats milliseconds into a MM:SS string.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates a new instance of VideoDetailsFragment with the specified Video.
